rooms.description: Serves as the entryway with built-in storage and a decorative console for plants, aligning with Bohemian aesthetics.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south and east walls to maximize natural light. The design features Bohemian decor with mixed textures.
Modern kitchen with Bohemian touches, open layout that leads to the dining area and includes ample natural light from a window.
The master bedroom features large windows on the east side for morning light, and an ensuite bathroom. Bohemian accents like patterned curtains and textured wall finishes add character.
Private bathroom adjacent to master bedroom, designed for convenience and intimacy.
